i5.las2peer.classLoaders

Class LibraryClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • i5.las2peer.classLoaders.LibraryClassLoader

  • public class LibraryClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    a LibraryClassLoader is responsible for loading classes from one library bundle, probably loaded via a Repository

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibraryClassLoader(LoadedLibrary lib)
      create a new class loader for the given library
      LibraryClassLoader(LoadedLibrary lib, BundleClassLoader parent)
      create a new class loader for a given library.
      LibraryClassLoader(java.lang.String jarfile)
      create a LibraryClassLoader for the given Jar file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String className) 
      java.lang.Class<?> findClassInternal(java.lang.String className)
      findClass is the only method that's actually needed for classloading this method will be called by loadClass, if the class is not already loaded and cannot be found in the parent classloader.
      LoadedLibrary getLibrary()
      get the library, this loader is responsible for
      java.net.URL getResource(java.lang.String resourceName)
      get the URL for a resource
      boolean hasParentLoaders()
      is this LibraryClassLoader registered within some BundleClassLoaders?
      protected java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String name, boolean resolve) 
      int numberOfParentLoaders()
      to how many BundleClassLoaders are registered to this LibraryClassLoader?

        public java.lang.Class<?> findClassInternal(java.lang.String className)
                                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        findClass is the only method that's actually needed for classloading this method will be called by loadClass, if the class is not already loaded and cannot be found in the parent classloader.

      • hasParentLoaders

        public boolean hasParentLoaders()
        is this LibraryClassLoader registered within some BundleClassLoaders?
        Returns:
        true, if a parent class loader is registered to this library class loader

        public int numberOfParentLoaders()
